entry.title: Hyde and Bootstrap
entry.content:
Just moving to github.io Github provide a very good platform to have your own static page. Using static page means that you don’t need to think about: database server setting * security

However, write a static page also means that you need to code the banner, links etc repetitively. Fortunately, we have hyde (github recommend jekyll, but I am a Python guy). By using hyde, you can enjoy the advantage of jinja template.

I can’t wait to hack around about it.

Right now, I’ve just add disqus to every post in my blog. This is cool :)
